import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import './BadgeEditForm.css' const BadgeEditForm = () => { const [selectedSport, setSelectedSport] = useState() const handleSportSelection = (e) => { setSelectedSport(e.target.innerText) console.log(e.target) } return ( {!selectedSport && <>
Tennis
Football
Table Tennis
Jogging
Cycling
Paintball
Air-Soft
Skiing
Basketball
Workout
Volleyball
Badminton
Ice Skating
Bowling
Laser Tag
}
{ selectedSport && <>
{selectedSport}
Choose your skill level for the selected sport
Recreational
Beginner
Intermediate
Advanced
}
) } export default BadgeEditForm;
